statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_id = 1;
SELECT sales_date, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 AND revenue > 1000;
SELECT sales_date, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(revenue) FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(revenue) > 1000;
SELECT sales_date, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, AVG(revenue) FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY AVG(revenue) DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, sale_date FROM sales WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales WHERE customer_id = 123 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shoes%' AND price < 50 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT s.product_name, r.amount FROM sales s JOIN revenue r ON s.id = r.sale_id WHERE s.customer_id = 456 AND r.revenue_date < '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT order_date, customer_id, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY orders_count DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT order_date, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY order_date HAVING total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers ORDER BY country DESC, city ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_date, quantity, total_amount FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT ProductID, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SaleAmount > 1000;
SELECT CustomerName, Email FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = 3;
SELECT ProductName, Category, Price FROM Products ORDER BY Price DESC;
SELECT Date, Revenue FROM RevenueTrends WHERE Revenue >= 5000 ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT ProductName, Category, Price FROM Products ORDER BY Price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT CustomerName, Email, Phone FROM Customers WHERE Phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY CustomerName ASC, Email DESC;
SELECT SaleID, SaleDate, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SaleAmount > 1000 ORDER BY SaleAmount DESC, SaleDate ASC;
SELECT CustomerName, Email, OrderDate FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.CustomerID = Orders.CustomerID ORDER BY OrderDate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Date, SUM(Revenue) AS TotalRevenue FROM RevenueTrends WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY Date ORDER BY Date ASC;
